website_summaries.verdict: It's a good camera and unquestionably better than that of any iPhone, but the DxO One isn't no-brainer-better than other options for the money. Yet.
pros: The DxO One's notable strengths include a well thought-out and attractive design and excellent photo quality on-par with its class
cons: It's expensive, and it's a little slow with short battery life

customer_reviews.title: the DxO One gives me a high quality camera
customer_reviews.text: The DxO One is very, very compact and easily fits into my pocket. It's hardly bigger than a GoPro, which makes it very mobile for me. Most importantly, the DxO One gives me a high quality camera. It's way better than my Iphone camera, and gives me the quality of my big DSLR camera. So, now I can leave my bulky camera at home, travel lighter, and still achieve the high quality images I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: jwest

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nothing short of amazing! A few years ago purchased a very nice Nikon camera, but rarely used it because all the settings confused me. This one is extremely user friendly, and takes very high quality pictures. I also love that for traveling, it's tiny. The times I did use my old camera it would be on vacation and I would always have it in my carry-on because I was scared of it getting stolen from my suitcase. The DxO fits right into my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with iOS 11
customer_reviews.text: I left an honest and negative review of this seller's product but the review was declined, not sure why. The item I recieved and the info on the DXO website states it does not work with iOS 11 or above and I can confirm that this is the case. Unless you just want it as a standalone camera or have an old iPhone 5C running pre iOS 11 software I would suggest this is not much use.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Barrable

customer_reviews.title: Give it a chance!
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this camera does exactly what it was intended to do. People have given it such terrible reviews, but I think that is due to them comparing it to an actual professional camera. It is not a professional camera. However, it is so much better than just using your phone camera. Takes pretty sharp photos. It sucks that you have to open the app to see the screen on your phone, but it’s whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most important warning
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work with a phone case, any case. I have the thinnest case you can find for the iPhone X and it does not work. Even without the case, the connection via the Lightning port is not secure, you virtually have to hold the phone and the device using both hands at all times. It's clumsy and consider the enhancements it offers, the clumsiness is totally not worth it. I have returned mine after 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Moto G6 or later phones
customer_reviews.text: A friend has this wonderful camera that attached to his older Android phone. The DXO website did not list my Moto G6 phone as compatible but it did say "others not listed" so I decided to give it a try. Sadly the male USB connector was not long enough to insert into the jack on my phone so it was returned to Amazon for a full refund. I gave this review 3 stars because the camera IS wonderful IF you can get it to work with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: DaveInAustinTx

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold charge, unusable 2 weeks outside of return window
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is superior to the iPhone X. I used this for social video production and was fairly happy with it. The charge lasted about 20 minutes for video and that made using it difficult but doable. However, the 4th time I used it (conveniently 2 weeks outside the return window) it would not charge passed 10%. Tried several different cables and charging blocks (I own a professional video production company so we have many cables on hand). Nothing worked. Avoid this purchase. Spend a little more and just get a decent point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good value camera enhancer for older iphones, but social sharing feature unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality as mentioned for older iphones for sure. Not sure if you’d see any quality improvement over the newer phones (iPhone X or even iphone 8 etc) but the manual camera controls are still useful. Only qualm I have is with the flash function. As it used the phones flash, which is on the opposite side of the lightning input, the flash is HORRIBLE - only got 1/2 the upper photo with flash - & not worth with using with this. Social sharing is ok. If you’re looking to save money and/or first using a photo editing software with your photos, you probably could go without this feature.
customer_reviews.author: C Finch

customer_reviews.title: A great concept but needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Right after charging it initially, I tried to plug it into my phone. It won't fit with the case on :( I only took one picture with the camera in auto mode, but I didn't like the way the photo turned out - the colors were not true on the camera screen, nor were they true in the resulting pic. It is awkward to shoot pics with my phone in portrait orientation. Fingers in the way, can't maneuver to push the button to take the pic. Overall, I know I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: MIMI AMATO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but a little cumbersome to use as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but a little cumbersome to use as you need to attach each time. Not easy to carry around for long periods but the end quality resulting photos are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone addition
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try this since the price came down. Got it just in time for a vacation at a national park and it took some great pics that I will be able to enlarge for prints. Battery life was fine, even in the extreme cold. I did have to take off my phone case to keep the camera secure in the lightning port.
customer_reviews.author: MWine

customer_reviews.title: Battery was DOA. Reset it and got it to charge, but drained fast
customer_reviews.text: Battery was DOA. Reset it and got it to charge, but drained fast. Reset it, updated the software. Battery life not acceptable. You would not be able to use it at all. Also, I had to take my iPhone out of the case to plug in the camera. Camera is very heavy also. I was able to snap a couple of pictures, but they were terrible quality. This has been discontinued by the manufacturer. Now I see why.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wathen

customer_reviews.title: not current ver. have not sd card.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved It today. It is not current version(update required). and it is not included 8gb sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not order
customer_reviews.text: It is very confusing. When you are recording it looks very strange. I don’t think it improves over the quality that my phone already has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really wanted this camera
customer_reviews.text: the reviews for this camera are great. may be an older external lens but they said even for the X it was awesome. My only problem was I had to order 3 back to back as none of them worked and 2 of them had been used and came without the accessories. even though it was ordered as new
customer_reviews.author: Sally H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well both connect to phone and free standing. The raw images work great for post processing. High level of detail in the images and works great under low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: SHoward

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet, but have seen one in use before. I look forward to taking it on my next trip. One “con” to report, though. As with SO many accessories that attach to phones, the plug won’t fit into the port if you have an Otterbox or Lifeproof case. If you have a case on your phone, get an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I finally was able to use this on a vacation and WOW!!! The picture quality is great. I use it with an iPhone 8+ which I thought had a great camera unless you zoomed. People would have grainy faces. Not anymore. I even recommended it to one of our waitresses. Easier to deal with that the DSLR my son was using. Only down thing is I wish the battery could last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shari R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a photographer, just a photography enthusiast. This is as close to a DSLR for your iPhone, I was hesitant to buy it even for the magnificent discount (140 bucks!!!) as I have an iPhone X. But this camera beats everything on the iPhone camera except for video. And if u use a tripod in low light is as close as a DSLR...and 20 megapixels in RAW!
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Good Images, Average Battery life
customer_reviews.text: in terms of technical specs this device delivers quality images, rather easy to use with the software. unfortunately it is discontinued and no further developments on this. one down side is that you have to press/hold down the lens cover button to pop out or to close the lightning connector.. which is quite.. irritating. nevertheless something worthwhile to get now when it is heavily discounted.
customer_reviews.author: KZSG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: This tiny camera is amazing for quick photos. Battery runs out quickly so bring a portable charger. Overall, not bad for the extremely small size! Definitely much better than phone cameras.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: So far haven’t found anything I dislike. Have been watching videos on how to use and tips, very helpful. Haven’t taken many pics yet, but the ones I have are great. Looking for a long term relationship with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally cheating, ain’t what I pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The item I bought is DXO “current model”, which should be CAM01-01-USA on the web site. Instead I got a older version CAM01-00-USA, with the label it says”current model” on the sealing film, it’s totally cheating. Wrost experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: LEE, HUNG-MO

customer_reviews.title: What’s in the box???
customer_reviews.text: When I read the DxO ONE USER MANUAL, They said,, + + + + + + + + + + + * What’s in the box Before use, make sure the following items are included in the package of your DxO ONE. If anything is missing, please contact your retailer. DxO ONE Camera 8GB MicroSD card USB Cable Pouch Wrist lanyard + + + + + + + + + + + But today, I received only Camera itself & USB Cable, NO SD Card, Pouch, Strap.
customer_reviews.author: HAN Kyu-Seop

customer_reviews.title: Would like it more if it worked with Filmborn
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, this is fantastic. 20 mp RAW images. The only thing I would like to see is if it worked directly with the Filmborn presets for iOS. I realize the impracticality since it is not using the iPhone’s or iPad’s native camera. I also don’t like the 32mm equivalent lens all these devises seem to want to have built in, inclung DxO One. Recharging is very very slow. Don't use Apple's adapter. Though. While much faster it will get you an overheat warning from the One.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Janavel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera. Mediocre execution.
customer_reviews.text: Great raw image quality. Poor battery life. Mediocre app. Very unfortunate that these guys went belly up. I think v2.0 could have been a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than iPhone, mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to what is coming out of the iPhone, this one is really good. But you need to edit your photos if you want to get the best of it.
customer_reviews.author: PabloTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: This camera changed completely the way how you take pictures. It is very easy to use, well built, smart, small, light, portable and the pictures are incredibles. I had my doubts about the manual control but it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: iPhone released for past 4 years take better picture than this. Still trying to understand the rationale behind this products existence and specially from such an organization who is know for measuring camera quality
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Mly

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture quality but not that much better than an Iphone X
customer_reviews.text: Connects smoothly however if you have a case you may need to get a port extension (also on amazon).
customer_reviews.author: AKD

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality takes some practice to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the low light quality, Great daytime pictures, lots of control but can not get accessories as the camera is no longer made. For the price I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Having used a friend's DXO and seen the results, I wanted an unused one. High quality in a very compact package. It does take a bit of getting used to on an Iphone, but the files it produces are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: smoothstones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture and video quality!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is fantastic! The battery life is sub-par but you can get through a short occasion if you manage the on/off button well. Although you can set the memory to store pictures/videos on both SD card and iPhone I constantly had to erase memory from the card in order to continue using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Bates

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Hard to get connector in and out. Contacted company and they no longer support. Do not waste your money. No info available on website either, such as a user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Krol

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend the product
customer_reviews.text: if you have latest iPhone or android phone you don’t really need this camera, battery life is really low. Only started exploring this camera couple of months after the purchase ( my bad) so cannot return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super small, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been working with these cameras for a long time, and have seen them get better and better over the years. Which is one of the most remarkable aspects of it... the fact that it keeps getting better via software updates! The new wireless shooting, untethered shooting and even streaming capabilities make it a lot of fun. When I don't want to carry a big camera, but I want more than my iPhone can deliver, this is what I grab.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Not friendly to Android !!! Same poduct but not same Feature !!! No dng edit No flashlight...
customer_reviews.text: I can't download dng from Dxo one on Android app, and no flashlight option. I saw youtube by Dxo one , "Full update" ....I want return it!
customer_reviews.author: Vincnet

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was excellent, and after finding the app and the instructions online it was very easy to use. I had to return it as after taking a 30 sec video and two pictures on auto the battery died
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: For the creative type
customer_reviews.text: Pic quality is awesome, I’m interested in low light photography, and using this gives me control, I did add the water proof case, I definitely recommend it if you want some sweet looking water pics.
customer_reviews.author: Yawd-Abroad

customer_reviews.title: The connector failed after just one week
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept and the capbilities of the camera. It is too bad that the quality of the connector rendered the device useless. I returned the camera and received a full return.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F Rico Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Photo is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Takes beautiful photos. The depth of field in my photos looks awesome. Very very impressed by this tiny camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality photos
customer_reviews.text: good accessory for iPhone. much more quality photo than iPhone, if convert raw file using DxO Connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but having a bit of trouble shooting steady
customer_reviews.text: Love it but having a bit of trouble shooting steady. I have put it on sport and that has helped...is there anything else I can do? This review was meant to be here not the addapter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Pro Camera at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures! The app doesn’t edit pictures need to download another app for this.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and easy to carry around. Takes very good still, video and time lapse.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Walker`

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live stream poor support
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t live stream sent several requests on how to do this. No help at all
customer_reviews.author: Daycare Providers Unlimited/Linda Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: I can not find the Android Early access program.
customer_reviews.text: I can not find the Android Early access program. Where can I download it? I can not use it because I can not connect to my mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: kyeong min roh

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. It takes great video and pictures. I am still playing with it but i love it up to this point. Pictures are crystal clear and so are the videos.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve battery life. Runs out in couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to improve battery life. Runs out in couple of hours and after taking few shots. Picture quality is decent. I would have kept if no issues with battery life.
customer_reviews.author: UD

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Always in my pocket, it's so small! Use it almost everyday, perfect for street photography, nobody really notice it. Also good for low light situations, long exposure photos are my new thing! You can see some shot I just did attached.
customer_reviews.author: John John Berthon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Bought it and the fiancée has been using ever since. We have taken hundreds of photos with it and they are great quality. Saves us from unpacking of DSLR out when we want a quick pic....
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely HATE this camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely HATE this camera. The battery is only good for maybe a dozen pictures. The worst flaw is the clunky software. It freezes frequently, which requires an un-install and download from the app store, which is impossible if you are off the grid. At this point, I just want my money back. Save your money, do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: T.L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but there was a deficit in the battery
customer_reviews.author: Hussam

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I've had the unit about a week now, the quality of the images are incredible for such a small camera plus easy to use and easy to carry. There is so much good about this camera but my only complaint is the extremely poor battery life. It's even worse than I anticipated. I hope there will be a fix for this. I will be traveling out of the country this year and was planning on using this camera exclusively but now I will need to take a backup. Until the battery life is improved I cannot recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I used my I pad to take some photos and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used my I pad to take some photos and found that the quality of photos taken with Dxo Pro with I pad and the ones shown by DXO as samples have huge difference in quality. I will continue to try it for few days and if I find the similiar results I may decide to just return this.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to check this camera in a shop where you ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend to check this camera in a shop where you could take pictures with her. I had horrible results in conditions of few light.
customer_reviews.author: hquintas

customer_reviews.title: A shame
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two weeks - liked it. Then would not turn on. Ordered replacement which would not operate at all. Great idea but clearly very tempremental.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun W.

product_meta.title: DxO ONE 20.2MP Digital Connected Camera for iPhone and iPad with Wi-Fi (Current Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:2.6"ESThe DxO ONE is a miniaturized pro quality camera. Equipped with a 1-inch format 20.2 megapixel sensor and a high-quality f/1.8 lens, it captures amazing images, even in extreme low light. In standalone, the Framing Assistant allows you to quickly compose and take photos with one hand. When directly connected to an iPhone, the D x O ONE features capabilities on par with those of a professional camera. 

Designed for Use with iPhone and iPad 

The unique, compact form factor of the camera is designed for use with an iPhone or iPad, and connects to the mobile device via its Lightning port. A dedicated app offers intuitive control over camera settings, live view monitoring, image playback, and the ability to save imagery to your mobile device for instant sharing. 

The DxO ONE is compatible with the iPhone SE, 6s Plus, 6s, 6 Plus, 6, 5s, 5c, 5, iPad Pro, Air 2, Air, mini 4, 3, 2, or iPad (4th gen.), running iOS 9.0 or later, or WatchOS 2.0. The camera is compatible with these mobile devices via Lightning connector, and can also be paired with them via Wi-Fi for remote control.
feature_bullets: Direct connection to iPhone or iPad via high-speed Lightning connector - large viewfinder, touch control and instant sharing. WiFi connectivity for remote camera controls
20.2MP 1" CMOS-BSI sensor and f/1.8 prime lens (32 mm equiv) - capture details even in extreme low light and take gorgeous portraits with soft bokeh
Fast shutter speed (to 1/20000 sec), Long Exposures to 30 seconds, high ISO (51200), full HD video (1080p/30, 720p/120)
Rechargeable lithium-ion battery and micro SD card slot (stores high-quality RAW format files; 8GB microSD card included)
Instantly share your DxO ONE images from your iPhone to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and more. Battery life - Up to 200 images

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars202 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
